text: "The Fir Tree" is a literary fairy tale by Hans Christian Andersen. It was published with "The Snow Queen" in Copenhagen, Denmark on 21 December 1844. The story tells of a fir tree unhappy with his life in the forest. He is cut and taken to the city where he becomes a decorated Christmas tree. He is thrilled, but the excitement is shortlived. One day he is discarded. ==Other websites== * * "The Fir Tree" English translation by Jean Hersholt Category:Fairy tales Category:Works by Hans Christian Andersen
title: The Fir Tree
